item.title: Mexus Gold US 10-K
item.description: Mexus Gold US, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 27, 2022 had 22126 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 470 instances 31 - 455 instances 2021 - 384 instances 2022 - 323 instances days - 288 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
